sentences.sCn: 七宝正想拒绝，一不留神被面包噎住，连忙灌了几口橙汁才艰难的咽下去。

sentences.sContent: On stripe back cushion, the decorative pattern that go up is like frivolous bedcover to ever was acquainted, familiar and kind, showily and elegant, typical Yapingning amorous feelings.

sentences.sCn: 条纹靠枕上，轻薄被面上的花纹似曾相识，熟悉而亲切、华贵而典雅，典型的亚平宁风情。
